thread.title: Ferris State, Western Michigan Hockey play to 1-1 OT tie

author: Shannon McGrattan
title: Ferris State, Western Michigan Hockey play to 1-1 OT tie
text: Updated: Friday, October 9 2015 6:54 AM EDT 2015-10-09 10:54:11 GMT Do you think communities should have the right to ban certain breeds of dogs? Why or why not?There’s a bill in front of the Michigan Legislature that would not allow municipalities to enforce regulations on certain dog breeds, such as pit bulls.Right now, 27 Michigan communities have certain breed specific restrictions.Animal right groups who support the measure say local bans on pit bulls are discriminatory...
